pr_title: Add block lock related metrics and catch throwable

timeline.message: Log some information when tryLock fail
Add some metrics to measure the status of AsyncBlockRemover

timeline.bodyText:
For all the locks, by convention, which do we log, lockid or block id?
Better to log in the same way
timeline.author: LuQQiu

replies.bodyText: I think we can print both lockId and blockId, blockId let us know the affect blocked block and file, lockId make it possible to unlock the bad lock when we have a global maintenance able lock view.
replies.author: maobaolong

timeline.bodyText:
Change to .setIsClusterAggregated(false)?
Our current way of defining cluster aggregated metrics is:

Set MetricKey with  .setIsClusterAggregated(true) so that this metrics is reported to the leading master
Create a MetricKey like CLUSTER_WORKER_BLOCK_REMOVER_BLOCKS_TO_REMOVED_TAKE_COUNT to represent the aggregated cluster metric.
In MetricStore.initCounterKeys add the cluster metric and worker metrics pair into the map
timeline.author: LuQQiu
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -740,6 +740,30 @@ public MetricKey build() {
           .setMetricType(MetricType.GAUGE)
           .setIsClusterAggregated(false)
           .build();
+  public static final MetricKey WORKER_BLOCK_REMOVER_BLOCKS_TO_REMOVED_TAKE_COUNT =
+      new Builder(Name.WORKER_BLOCK_REMOVER_BLOCKS_TO_REMOVED_TAKE_COUNT)
+          .setDescription("Total number of asyncBlockRemover take block count")
+          .setMetricType(MetricType.COUNTER)
+          .setIsClusterAggregated(true)

timeline.bodyText: no need to log session since we didn't track session correctly after Alluxio 1.5
timeline.author: LuQQiu

replies.bodyText: I think we can distinguish where the lock requester come from, If it come from AsyncBlockRemover, the sessionId could be MASTER_COMMAND_SESSION_ID=-4
replies.author: maobaolong

timeline.author: LuQQiu

replies.bodyText:
Can you help remove this tryLock changes in this PR for now? Other logics LGTM.
I have a PR to move all lock.lock() to tryLock() #12507
but still need more discussion with @apc999 to see if we want to move to tryLock
replies.author: LuQQiu

replies.bodyText: Okay, It's make sense to use tryLock instead wait for lock forever with silence.
replies.author: maobaolong

timeline.bodyText:
Similar to PropertyKey, the MetricKey targets to be viewed by users who may not view Alluxio source codes. Can you help change the MetricKey name and description to be easier to understand?
Suggestion: WORKER_BLOCK_REMOVER_BLOCKS_TO_REMOVED_TAKE_COUNT -> WORKER_BLOCK_REMOVER_TRY_REMOVE_COUNT
WORKER_BLOCK_REMOVER_BLOCKS_TO_REMOVED_SUCCESS_COUNT -> WORKER_BLOCKS_REMOVER_REMOVED_COUNT
will be even better if we can track the try remove and removed in the whole worker not only in AsyncRemover if possible.
timeline.author: LuQQiu

replies.bodyText:
I've change the property key name and description.

will be even better if we can track the try remove and removed in the whole worker not only in AsyncRemover if possible.

Do you mind using another metrics to monitor all try remove and removed blocks count in the whole worker?
replies.author: maobaolong

timeline.bodyText: The total number of blocks tried to be removed from this worker by asynchronous block remover.
timeline.author: LuQQiu
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -740,6 +740,30 @@ public MetricKey build() {
           .setMetricType(MetricType.GAUGE)
           .setIsClusterAggregated(false)
           .build();
+  public static final MetricKey WORKER_BLOCK_REMOVER_BLOCKS_TO_REMOVED_TAKE_COUNT =
+      new Builder(Name.WORKER_BLOCK_REMOVER_BLOCKS_TO_REMOVED_TAKE_COUNT)
+          .setDescription("Total number of asyncBlockRemover take block count")

replies.bodyText: Similar for all other metric key names and descriptions
replies.author: LuQQiu

timeline.message: Modify the description and name of metrickey, log lockId and blockId.

timeline.bodyText: Will it be better to change to WORKER_BLOCK_REMOVER_TRY_REMOVE_BLOCKS_SIZE
timeline.author: LuQQiu
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -740,6 +740,34 @@ public MetricKey build() {
           .setMetricType(MetricType.GAUGE)
           .setIsClusterAggregated(false)
           .build();
+  public static final MetricKey WORKER_BLOCK_REMOVER_TRY_REMOVE_COUNT =
+      new Builder(Name.WORKER_BLOCK_REMOVER_TRY_REMOVE_COUNT)
+          .setDescription("The total number of blocks tried to be removed from this worker "
+              + "by asynchronous block remover.")
+          .setMetricType(MetricType.COUNTER)
+          .setIsClusterAggregated(false)
+          .build();
+  public static final MetricKey WORKER_BLOCK_REMOVER_REMOVED_COUNT =
+      new Builder(Name.WORKER_BLOCK_REMOVER_REMOVED_COUNT)
+          .setDescription("The total number of blocks was removed from this worker "
+              + "by asynchronous block remover.")
+          .setMetricType(MetricType.COUNTER)
+          .setIsClusterAggregated(false)
+          .build();
+  public static final MetricKey WORKER_BLOCK_REMOVER_BLOCKS_TO_REMOVE_SIZE =

timeline.message: Fix metrics name and description to make it easy to understand
